data.title: Team AREND Wildlife Conservation UAV by Eric Schmidt — Kickstarter
data.name: Eric Schmidt
data.description: International student team creating an unmanned aerial vehicle system to combat African rhino poaching and illicit wildlife trafficking

data.title: The Pocket Drone - Your personal flying robot by AirDroids — Kickstarter
data.name: AirDroids
data.description: The world's first multicopter that's powerful enough to carry a high quality action camera and folds up smaller than a 7in tablet.

data.title: Game of Drones - The World's Toughest Drone Airframe. by Marque Cornblatt — Kickstarter
data.name: Marque Cornblatt
data.description: Only A Few Hours Left! The Action-Sports Drone Airframe: The Virtually Unbreakable, Practically Indestructible Airframe. Act Now!

data.title: PowerUp 3.0 - Smartphone Controlled Paper Airplane by Shai Goitein — Kickstarter
data.name: Shai Goitein
data.description: PowerUp 3.0 turns your self-made paper airplane into a smartphone-controlled flying machine

data.title: ICARUS by ICARUS — Kickstarter
data.name: ICARUS
data.description: A stealth, ultra-light, highly-efficient, flapping-wing UAV, capable of accurate and natural reproduction of real bird-flight dynamics.

data.title: Bluetooth Bridge: Connecting Drones and Tablets/Smartphones by Jeff Taylor and Roy Stevens — Kickstarter
data.name: Jeff Taylor and Roy Stevens
data.description: Bluetooth Bridge creates a seamless link for connecting tablet and smartphone based ground stations to ArduPilot-based drones.

data.title: Robot Fourbot - A copter that anyone can fly! by Aksel Gaspari — Kickstarter
data.name: Aksel Gaspari
data.description: Inexpensive multi rotor air robot that enables you to capture amazing photos & Videos from the air.
